name: Buttery Consequeces
description:
Buttery Consequences is a factory game where you make butter chicken with different "Unintentional Side effects" for the customers that you have to solve with a saucer.

Music by: @haberchuck

How to play:

  • Place a farm to get chicken and butter
  • Place an oven to make butter chicken
  • Place after that a Meal Maker to change values and make meals
  • Enjoy!
